About Daksh Babbar – Aspiring Computer Scientist

I am spending a focused, self‑directed year deepening my computer‑science expertise through advanced study and hands‑on system optimisation projects. My work sits at the intersection of algorithm design, statistical modelling and ultra‑low‑latency software‑hardware integration. To support these pursuits I am expanding my grasp of pure mathematics, including calculus, linear algebra and combinatorics, while refining competitive‑programming fluency in Python and C++. Alongside these studies I am conducting research on improving real-world efficiency of embedded systems, and I lead volunteer workshops that deliver digital‑literacy skills to under‑resourced students.

Key Achievements in STEM Olympiads

  • International Rank 2 — SOF International Mathematics Olympiad (2021)
  • International Rank 2 — SOF National Science Olympiad (2021)
  • International Rank 4 — SOF International English Olympiad (2023)
  • 1st Rank, North India — 7th Korea–India Friendship Quiz (2022)
  • Over 30 medals earned across various international, zonal, & and school-level STEM Olympiads

Leadership & Community Engagement

  • Volunteer Educator (2023–Present)

    Delivered digital literacy and English education to underprivileged children as part of a certified NGO initiative.

  • Class Prefect (2018–2023)

    Consistently entrusted with leadership roles and responsibilities across multiple academic years.

Extracurricular Highlights

  • Zonal Table Tennis Champion (2022–2023)

    Secured 1st place in the Zonal Games representing school-level competition.

  • Environmental Advocacy & Competitions

    Awarded Gold Medals in the Green Olympiad (2018, 2023). Winner of high-profile events such as the INTACH Heritage Quiz and Science & Technology Poster Competitions.

  • Piano Performer & Diploma Holder

    Performed at distinguished venues. Earned a diploma in Piano from Vaan Academy, New Delhi.
